content: Tank VC 4-T15 ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Construction vacuums and dust extractors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Powerful yet compact – pairs with our most powerful cordless vacuum to help reduce dust for increased safety, and clean up your jobsites more efficiently Modular design – attach your VC 4X-22 vacuum top to increase storage capacity Applications Wet and dry vacuum cleaning of construction dust, extraction of wood dust/ chips, and concrete debris from drilling/ breaking Large storage tank and automatic filter cleaning enables cordless concrete grinding Wet extraction, dry diamond drilling, sanding, and light grinding/cutting/slitting ### TECHNICAL DATA: Container capacity: 15 l Dust capacity: 36 lb. Application: Cleaning, Drilling and breaking, Wood sawing, Cutting and grinding (light, up to 125 mm / 5 in), Drywall and wood sanding, Wet coring, Socket cutting Technical Data | Dust capacity | 36 lb | Application | Cleaning, Drilling and breaking, Wood sawing, Cutting and grinding (light, up to 125 mm / 5 in), Drywall and wood sanding, Wet coring, Socket cutting | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 15.4 x 15 x 21.1 mm ### ITEMS- 2402236 - Tank VC 4-T15 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x VC 3/4-T15 Tank
